channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Up to $2,000 Off LG Promo Codes & Coupons
item.description: Save up to 20% with an LG promo code today, plus up to $2,000 off when you shop the LG Innovation Days event.

item.title: Nothing closes $200M Series C led by Tiger Global, plans AI-first device launch
item.description: Carl Pei's Nothing is raising $200 million in a Series C round from Tiger Global at a $1.3 billion valuation.

item.title: Human Design Is Blowing Up. Following It Might Make You Leave Your Spouse
item.description: The astrology-like system uses birthdates to break people into personality types and even find love and riches. From sleeping arrangements to diets, s...

item.title: Matthew Prince Wants AI Companies to Pay for Their Sins
item.description: The Cloudflare CEO joined The Big Interview to talk about standing up to content scraping, the internet’s potential futures, and his company's relatio...

item.title: One Vigilante, 22 Cell Towers, and a World of Conspiracies
item.description: Inside the mind of the most prolific anti-5G arsonist in the world—and the incoherent, very online political violence of our era.

item.title: How to Shop Like a Pro During Amazon Prime Day (2025)
item.description: We’ve got tips to help you find real deals on Amazon Prime Big Deal Days this October.

item.title: Rodatherm Energy wants to make geothermal more efficient, but will it be cheaper?
item.description: Rodatherm Energy emerged from stealth with $38 million in Series A funding. It plans to build a closed-loop geothermal power plant that uses refrigera...

item.title: Divergent raises $290M to expand production of specialized military parts
item.description: Divergent Technologies' new round will help the company expand its manufacturing footprint across the U.S.

item.title: Robinhood plans to launch a startups fund open to all retail investors
item.description: The “Robinhood Ventures Fund I” is intended to allow any retail investor to make money on startups, but the details are scant.

item.title: With no DOJ breakup, Alphabet becomes a $3 trillion company
item.description: Investors continue to reward Alphabet's stock after a judge declined to break up Google earlier this month.
